RelatedSentence: Police have appealed for witnesses to a road rage incident on the A96 near Inverness .
The driver of a blue Vauxhall Astra was assaulted by a man who was about 19 years old and 5 ft 10 in tall .

A0: The driver of a blue Vauxhall Astra
RelatedSentence: He was believed to have been driving a grey Peugeot 205 and part of its registration was N204 , or similar .
Police said the road was busy at the time .
